content:
Example 1:
Text: Little old Mary (shes 78) was my #firstsale today, she bought a 30 of Keystone Light. Shes tried to set me up with her grand daughter
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: My honey is sick again!  I think he's getting old!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: Over the weekend, I came across a perfectly dreadful essay about how awful it is to look young.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: Risque tonight for Smut Night and I guess my birthday. I need to drown my old age in beer
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: Sold my 10 year old kinetic. Sad to see it go
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: Some old Metallica is niiiice.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: This one works.  RIP  Classic .....In ode to my nine year old crush: http://bit.ly/fEWSL
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: Wake up with terrible back ache...I'm getting old..should drink high calcium milk more often
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 9:
Text: Watching Desperate Housewives then Brothers & Sisters.  Back to the old salt mines tomorrow....the lottery has passed me by yet again.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: Watching old band vids and recordings
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: ahhh.. its so time 4 me to call it a night, this is how i know im getting old
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: blair's mum is scary. she doenst look old enough to be her mum. Rufus & Lily are so CUTE  haha everyone's cute today
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: i keep begging my mom to let me move to Nebraska...she said i can when im older
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: if you start repelling technology, does it mean you're getting old?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: is really sad Farrah Fawcett died....I really want to go watch old Charlie's Angels episodes now...
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: just played basketball for the first time in over a year.. man, i feel old  #fb
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 17:
Text: ran 10 miles this morning and got lost again... might have lost my 4 year old iPod in the rain too.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: very suggest! i want but no one people to i meet here  all my folks are young, huhuhu  comeback to o-ce-n
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: want to bring back the same old days in my life!
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: watched a bunch of old skating videos, it brought back so many memories! i miss the good old days
Annotation from annotator: 2

Text: Omg I just had to scream into an oldmans face I had to check a bitch before I wrecked a bitch, for real just fought with a senior  ackward
Annotation from annotator:
